en_question:
5.27 The Yangtze General Shopping Mall has an area of 5,000 m² available for lease and plans to attract tenants from the following five categories of stores. The table below (Table 5-12) shows the area occupied by each store, the minimum and maximum number of stores allowed for each category, and the expected annual profit (in thousand yuan) per store depending on the number of stores opened in the mall. Each store pays 20% of its annual profit as rent to the mall. Question: How many stores of each type should the mall lease to maximize total rental income(in thousand Yuan)? Table 5-12
IDStore TypeArea per Store (m²)Number of StoresProfit per Store (thousand Yuan)
MinMax123
1Jewelry25013987
2Shoes & Hats35012109\
3Department Store80013272120
4Bookstore400021610\
5Catering50013171512
cn_question:
5.27长江综合商场有 $5~000~\mathrm{{m}^{2}}$ 面积招租，拟吸收以下5类商店人租。已知各类商店开设一个店铺占用的面积，在该商场内最少与最多开设的个数，以及每类商店开设不同个数时每个商店的全年预期利润（万元)如表5-12所示。各商店以年赢利的$20\,\%$ 作为租金上交商场。问：该商场应招租上述各类商店各多少个，使总租金的收人为最大? 表5-12
代号商店类别一个店铺面积/m开 设数不同开设数时一个店铺利润/万元
最少最多123
1珠宝25013987
2鞋帽35012109\
3百货80013272120
4书店400021610\
5餐饮50013171512
